body: You follow up an attack with a surprising series of sweeping blows.
name: Improved Surprise Follow-Through
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/New Racial Rules/Half-Orc Feats/Improved Surprise Follow-Through

sections.body: Str 13, Cleave, Great Cleave, Power Attack, Surprise Follow Through, base attack bonus +8.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When using Great Cleave, each opponent you attack on your turn (other than the first) is denied his Dexterity bonus against you.
